attributes.action: just, please, stop and think about what you are doing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Blair, I find it very hard to believe that you think many of the bills you are attempting to introduce will actually help the country and endear you to those who love, work and live in this country. Road Pricing? ID Cards? Anti-Terrorism Laws? You used to be the best thing that had happened to this country since the end of World War II. Do you honestly believe you still are? What an absolute shame your career is ending so badly. Be decent, be honest and, please, just think about what you are doing to our beautiful, liberal, free nation.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
